reviewsJson.markdown:
**rda**/ Velocity

**% Used**/5 

**coil**/ Clapton **w**/ 55   

**Steep time**/ 3 weeks **wicking**/ Full 

**Mouth Feel** - grainy and slightly Sharp light on the tongue moderately dense 4 out of 10 with a very light throat hit              
  
**Flavor Properties** - sweet and syrupy with a nice cereal flavor very light on the cinnamon         
  
**Relatable Flavors** - French toast light on the syrup or those pancakes with the syrup nuggets inside also  
Cinnamon Toast Crunch which is what I believe they were going for pretty close but not perfect
                             
**Off Flavors** - getting a off brand Cola kind of flavor  with cinnamon         

**Position in the recipe** - think this is going to work best in the background with a few friends and should make a decent base as well

**Pairings** -bakeries creams and other cereal should work nicely and meringue to kick up the cereal note

I think it could also use a little extra cinnamon the whole list of berries should go very nicely also I'm  interested in trying a little pair to push that Cola flavor
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Cinnamon Crunch
